casebody.data:
Trevon Deandre RICE
v.
HARNETT COUNTY DISTRICT COURT, Jacqualyn L. Lee. No. 428P15. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Jan. 28, 2016. Trevon DeAndre Rice, for Rice, Trevon DeAndre. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for Harnett County District Court. Vernon K. Stewart, District Attorney, for Harnett County District Court.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Plaintiff on the 22nd of December 2015 in this matter for a writ of mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Harnett County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of January 2016."
